Headline: Howard-bound Purple Line Service Delayed at Foster
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Foster due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Foster due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
